CAM@ C43013 Nissan Cedric 130 1969 12th All Japan Stocker Fuji 300km 3rd Place Y. Sugawara

Purchased: 2014

This is the car Yoshimasa Sugawara drove to his best finish in the Fuji "All Japan Stocker" series - 3rd place in the 12th race on September 6, 1969. Looking at his CV on jaf.org it's interesting to see that Sugawara's car of choice seemed to be Mini Coopers. Especially interesting when you realize he eventually raced the following in more than 20 Dakar rallies:


Click here for a group shot of all 4 racing Cedrics from CAM@.
